item.title: Busting Up a Nexus of Narco-Terrorism
item.description: U.S. pressure on the Iran-Venezuela-Cuba crime network will help protect the Western Hemisphere for years to come.

item.title: The Leo Strauss Letter That Previewed a Modern-Day Divide
item.description: As 65-year-old letters between conservative heavyweights reveal, the right’s internecine clashes on foreign policy are nothing new.

item.title: ‘Faithless’ — Springsteen’s Latest Hysterical Politics
item.description: Scritti Politti’s ‘Faithless’ — political songwriting done right.

item.title: Trump’s Greenland Gambit Alienates the European Right He Once Inspired
item.description: The U.S. president is losing the goodwill of the very nationalists and conservatives who until recently saw him as an ally.

item.title: Canada’s Misguided China Overtures
item.description: We understand why Prime Minister Mark Carney’s pride has been wounded, but we urge him to think harder about the long-term interest of his country.
